column5: I been trying to comb tribute to Team 3 and as I fish most salt water I decided to do some carping my first results where very mixed caught 6 snappers and 2 20â€ carp  on boilies I made ( work well for large snappers 1 @26 lbs and 1 @ 25 1/2 lbs) and  hair curlers for a method feeder .    Next outing was much better with no turtles and 4 fish and a bit larger same set up as before.    Finally made well the next time out with more fish going 4 for 7 and a bit larger fish
Well done!!     How big is the carp in the picture??  Glad to see that the time effort you have been putting into this is paying off
nice catch! is that a PB snapper?

maybe snapping turtles should be part of the tourney? lol currently we have a 25" carp.. since i don't know anything about carping.. i'm hoping someone can pick up the slack for team 3.. let's see if you can beat cliff's 37" carp.. YOU CAN DO IT!!  go team 3 go!
man I caught one this year too...

I've caught many snappers.Snappers are powerful swimmers and can put up a decent fight if you catch them on a minnow, pike hook and bobber, but on a worm and hooked through the lip, they come straight up.  Sounds like the carp were biting. Though I dont think carp can compare to salt water fishing.
the one pictured is only 24" I sent in the 27" to gerrit  Going striper fishing Saturday!!!
Yep pb on the snapper  thinking about starting  a  snapper guiding service
this is the 25 1/2  pounder. He was a bit upset at being interupeted during dinner !!!

Congrats on the tourney entry ALEX!  I knew it was only a matter of time before you started to bring them in.  Now you gotta find a spot that hold lots of hungry big ones!!  Glad to hear your home made boilies are working out for you too.  Those snapping turtles look NASTY!!!
so when can we book the snapping turtle guiding service?  i have only caught one that's about 2lbs ... really hope that i can hook into the bigguns  lol
I’ll set you up with the Deluxe package, Includes 20 lbs snappers and the super secret snapper boilies recipe and a trip to Time Square.
